title: Legis Structure in UK and Nigeria

content.description: Country Number of Chambers Legislature Chooses Executive China 1 Yes Iran 1 No Mexico 2 No Nigeria 2 No Russia 2 No United Kingdom 2 Yes
content.question: Which of the following is an accurate description of a difference in the legislative structures of the countries?

choices.label: In the United Kingdom, the upper house is not elected, while in Nigeria, the upper house is elected.
In Iran, the Guardian Council supervises the legislature, while in China, the legislature oversees the Communist Party.
In Mexico, the lower house is appointed, while in Russia, the lower house is elected.
In Mexico, the Senate has the power to confirm all political appointments, while in the United Kingdom, the power to confirm appointments lies with the lower house.

content.answer: In the United Kingdom, the upper house is not elected, while in Nigeria, the upper house is elected.
